paramInformation.label: Supervision Timeout
paramInformation.description: How long to wait for a supervision report in response to a supervision get from the sensor

paramInformation.label: Supervision Retries
paramInformation.description: Number of application level retries attempted for messages either not ACKed or Supervision encapsulated messages that did not receive a report

paramInformation.label: Supervision Back Off
paramInformation.description: Used to calculate the delay between retried messages

paramInformation.label: Supervision Battery Report Frequency
paramInformation.description: The number of battery report messages sent before being encapsulated in supervision

paramInformation.label: Build Number
paramInformation.description: The Jenkins build number for this firmware
